roadmap_2026.title: Cthulu Trading System - 2026 Strategic Roadmap
roadmap_2026.subtitle: Evolution from Autonomous Trading System to AI-Native Trading Platform
roadmap_2026.vision: Become the world's most advanced open-source AI-native trading platform, empowering traders with enterprise-grade automation, intelligent risk management, and community-driven innovation

theme_1.name: Production Excellence
theme_1.description: Achieve enterprise-grade reliability, performance, and operational excellence
key_goals: Automated recovery from all transient failures

theme_2.name: AI/ML Leadership
theme_2.description: Establish Cthulu as the most advanced AI-native trading system in the open-source ecosystem
key_goals: Automated model training and deployment pipeline
Ensemble ML models with uncertainty quantification
Reinforcement learning for strategy and risk optimization

theme_3.name: Multi-Asset Trading
theme_3.description: Expand from single-instrument to comprehensive portfolio management
key_goals: Trade 10+ symbols concurrently with independent strategies
Support for forex, equities, commodities, crypto

theme_4.name: Community Ecosystem
theme_4.description: Build vibrant community with strategy sharing, education, and collaboration
key_goals: Partner program for educators and influencers

theme_5.name: Cloud-Native Platform
theme_5.description: Simplify deployment and enable scalability through cloud-native architecture
key_goals: One-click deployment to AWS, GCP, Azure

key_deliverables.name: Unified Risk Management Module
key_deliverables.description: Single, comprehensive risk manager replacing fragmented modules
key_deliverables.business_value: Simplified maintenance, consistent risk logic, easier testing
key_deliverables.technical_details: Merge risk/manager.py and position/risk_manager.py into unified module with backward-compatible API

key_deliverables.name: Enhanced Error Recovery System
key_deliverables.description: Comprehensive automatic recovery from all transient failures
key_deliverables.business_value: Near-zero manual intervention, improved uptime, user confidence
key_deliverables.technical_details: Auto-reconnect to MT5, position reconciliation, database recovery, graceful ML degradation

key_deliverables.name: Automated Performance Benchmarking
key_deliverables.business_value: Prevent performance regressions, quantify optimizations, data-driven decisions
key_deliverables.technical_details: Continuous latency/throughput tracking, resource profiling, regression alerts

key_deliverables.name: 100-Hour Stress Test Certification
key_deliverables.description: Validate rock-solid reliability under continuous load
key_deliverables.business_value: Production confidence, marketing credibility, identify edge cases
key_deliverables.technical_details: 100+ hours continuous operation, memory leak detection, failure mode documentation

business_outcomes: Reduced support burden from automatic recovery

key_deliverables.name: Automated Model Retraining Pipeline
key_deliverables.description: Nightly retraining with A/B testing and automated deployment
key_deliverables.business_value: Models stay fresh with market conditions, no manual intervention
key_deliverables.technical_details: Scheduled jobs, model versioning, A/B testing framework, auto-rollback on degradation

key_deliverables.name: Advanced Feature Engineering
key_deliverables.description: Expand feature set with market microstructure indicators
key_deliverables.business_value: Improved model accuracy, better edge in markets
key_deliverables.technical_details: Order flow imbalance, volume profile, market depth, session features, temporal features

key_deliverables.name: RL-Based Strategy Selector
key_deliverables.description: Replace heuristic strategy selection with RL agent
key_deliverables.business_value: Adaptive strategy selection that learns from live results
key_deliverables.technical_details: Contextual bandit or multi-armed bandit, online learning, exploration-exploitation balance

key_deliverables.name: Ensemble Prediction System
key_deliverables.description: Multiple models with weighted voting for robust predictions
key_deliverables.business_value: Reduced prediction variance, uncertainty quantification, better accuracy
key_deliverables.technical_details: Tree-based, neural, linear models combined via stacking or voting, calibrated probabilities

technical_achievements: Expanded feature library with microstructure data
Ensemble ML system with uncertainty quantification
business_outcomes: Improved trading performance from better models
Foundation for advanced research and publications

key_deliverables.name: Multi-Symbol Trading Engine
key_deliverables.description: Refactored core to handle 10+ symbols concurrently
key_deliverables.business_value: Unlock portfolio strategies, diversification, higher capacity
key_deliverables.technical_details: Parallel data ingestion, independent strategies per symbol, shared risk budget

key_deliverables.name: Portfolio Risk Manager
key_deliverables.business_value: Better risk management across correlated assets, diversification benefits
key_deliverables.technical_details: Total exposure limits, correlation matrix, VaR/CVaR calculations, sector diversification

key_deliverables.name: Portfolio Optimization Engine
key_deliverables.description: Modern portfolio theory for allocation and rebalancing
key_deliverables.business_value: Optimal capital allocation, Sharpe ratio maximization, risk parity
key_deliverables.technical_details: Mean-variance optimization, risk parity, max Sharpe, rebalancing triggers

key_deliverables.name: Cross-Asset Analysis Dashboard
key_deliverables.description: Real-time correlation and regime analysis across assets
key_deliverables.business_value: Market regime awareness, correlation breakdowns, risk diversification insights
key_deliverables.technical_details: Correlation matrix, cross-asset regime detection, flight-to-quality indicators

key_deliverables.name: Strategy Marketplace Platform
key_deliverables.description: Web platform for discovering and sharing community strategies
key_deliverables.business_value: Network effects, community engagement, strategy diversity
key_deliverables.technical_details: Upload/download interface, performance stats, backtesting required, rating system

key_deliverables.name: Cloud Deployment Templates
key_deliverables.description: One-click deployment to AWS, GCP, Azure
key_deliverables.business_value: Lower barrier to entry, scalability, enterprise adoption
key_deliverables.technical_details: Kubernetes Helm charts, Terraform modules, Docker Compose, CI/CD templates

key_deliverables.name: Mobile Monitoring App
key_deliverables.description: iOS/Android app for trade monitoring and alerts
key_deliverables.business_value: On-the-go monitoring, improved user experience, emergency controls
key_deliverables.technical_details: Real-time position sync, push notifications, performance dashboards, kill-switch

key_deliverables.name: Educational Platform & Certifications
key_deliverables.business_value: User onboarding, community growth, thought leadership
key_deliverables.technical_details: Video tutorials, Jupyter notebooks, certification exams, workshops

features: 100% type hints coverage for mypy strict mode
Improved setup wizard with AI assistance

data_storage.2026_target: Distributed storage, object storage for ML data
key_migrations: S3/GCS for backtest results and ML data
Redis for caching and real-time state

ml_infrastructure.2026_target: MLOps platform, automated pipelines, model registry
key_migrations: MLflow or Weights & Biases for experiment tracking

observability.2026_target: Full observability stack with distributed tracing

competitive_positioning.target_market: Retail algorithmic traders, quant researchers, trading system developers
key_differentiators: AI-native with ML/RL at core (vs traditional rules-based)

technical_risks.mitigation: Abstraction layer, regression testing, community monitoring

technical_risks.risk: ML model degradation in live markets
technical_risks.mitigation: Continuous monitoring, auto-retraining, ensemble models, human-in-loop alerts
Load testing, async architecture, resource profiling, gradual rollout

market_risks.mitigation: Compliance monitoring, legal review, geographic diversification
Multi-broker support, community feedback, broker partnerships

community_risks.mitigation: Marketing, educational content, influencer partnerships, open communication
Mandatory backtesting, code review, rating system, community moderation

infrastructure_costs.hosting: AWS/GCP credits for CI/CD, staging environments

community_investment.marketing: Content creation, video production, social media
community_investment.rewards: Bounties for contributions, bug fixes, strategies

governance.decision_making: Core team consensus with community input
governance.feature_prioritization: Combination of strategic alignment, community votes, and technical feasibility
governance.release_process: Semantic versioning, monthly minors, quarterly majors
governance.community_involvement: GitHub Discussions for proposals, voting on major features
